metadata.title: CVE-2021-30887 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions. This issue is fixedin macOS Monterey 12.0.1, iOS 15.1 and iPadOS 15.1, watchOS 8.1, tvOS 15.1.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to unexpectedlyunenforced Content Security Policy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30887` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.34.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
